comments.body:
This seems to help from brute force debugging on the single test failure, but probably isn't right--we may for example just lose the `--coverage` flag completely by doing this instead of putting it in `extra_args` somewhere else.

I guess I'll have to drill down on that.
Can you drop the `[0]`, and use `(compiler_fix=fix+fixflags+fflags)` instead of `(compiler_fix=[fix]+fixflags+fflags)` below?

I tried it just now, but it breaks NumPy build:

```
  File "/Users/treddy/github_projects/numpy/numpy/distutils/fcompiler/__init__.py", line 524, in customize
    self.set_commands(compiler_fix=fix+fixflags+fflags)
TypeError: must be str, not list
```
That's probably because you didn't drop the `[0]` on line 493
